explains: n. 加倍；并线；折回；防护板；衬里
v. 使加倍；使成双（double 的 ing 形式）；绕过；握紧
wordGroup: chromosome doubling 染色体加倍；染色体复制；染色体配对
doubling time 倍增时间；重复时间

sentences.en: Doubling the frequency of logical operations inside a microprocessor doubles the heat output.
sentences.cn: 微处理器内部逻辑操作的频率加倍，产生的热量也加倍。

sentences.en: Losing a job is hurting: you don't skip down to the job centre with a song in your heart, delighted at the prospect of doubling your income from the generous state.
sentences.cn: 失去一份工作是痛苦的：你不会在心里哼着歌蹦蹦跳跳地去就业中心，为你能从这个慷慨的国家获得双倍收入而高兴。
